title: Bridge to Life , Ltd .: Bridge to Life Secures FDA De Novo Clearance for VitaSmart Hypothermic Oxygenated Perfusion ( HOPE ) System , the First Ever U . S . Approval for Cold Machine Perfusion in Liver Transplant Preservation
